bonus.value: Increase healing capability and healing received by 10%/12%/14%/16%.
When you or your teammates are healed, increase ATK by 12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% for 6 seconds. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

mind.name: 工艺直觉
mind.desc: 制作手工时的创造思维同样可以运用在战斗上。

memory.name: 背影重叠
memory.desc: 她的背影渐渐与记忆中保护者的身影重叠。

belief.name: 疗愈之心
belief.desc: 她所期望的很简单，能够抚慰你的伤痛就好。

emotion.name: 与你携手
emotion.desc: 相信我，辅助工作就交给我吧。

undefined.name: 诚心正意
undefined.desc: 以诚待人，有时候也会产生误解。
